errors.name: InvalidBody
errors.msg: The body of your email is too long. The max is 512 chars

errors.name: InvalidSubject
errors.msg: The subject of your email is too long. The max is 40 chars

errors.name: InvalidSalt
errors.msg: The salt should be exactly 16 chars

errors.name: InvalidIv
errors.msg: The IV should be exactly 32 chars

errors.name: InvalidDiffie
errors.msg: The diffie publickey should be exactly 64 chars

errors.name: InvalidDestination
errors.msg: From and to address should not be same

errors.name: InvalidSource
errors.msg: Signer and from address should be same

errors.name: InvalidUsername
errors.msg: Invalid username - must be 3-32 characters, alphanumeric and underscores only

errors.name: UsernameAlreadyWrapped
errors.msg: Username is already wrapped as NFT

errors.name: CannotModifyWrappedUsername
errors.msg: Cannot modify wrapped username - unwrap first

errors.name: WrapperAlreadyExists
errors.msg: Wrapper already exists for this username

errors.name: InvalidNftAmount
errors.msg: Invalid NFT amount - must be exactly 1

errors.name: UsernameAlreadyHasMailbox
errors.msg: Username already has a linked mailbox

errors.name: UsernameNoMailbox
errors.msg: Username does not have a linked mailbox

errors.name: InvalidMailboxAccount
errors.msg: Mailbox account does not exist or is invalid

errors.name: CannotLinkMailboxToWrappedUsername
errors.msg: Cannot link mailbox to wrapped username

errors.name: CannotUnlinkMailboxFromWrappedUsername
errors.msg: Cannot unlink mailbox from wrapped username

errors.name: UsernameMustHaveNoMailboxBeforeWrapping
errors.msg: Username must have no mailbox before wrapping

errors.name: MailboxOperationsLocked
errors.msg: Mailbox operations are locked for this wrapped username

errors.name: RateLimitExceeded
errors.msg: Rate limit exceeded: too many usernames created in time window

errors.name: RateLimitTooFrequent
errors.msg: Rate limit exceeded: creation too frequent, please wait

errors.name: AccountNotInitialized
errors.msg: Account not initialized or has invalid discriminator

errors.name: UsernameInBiddingPeriod
errors.msg: Username is currently in bidding period

errors.name: PaymentGatingEnabled
errors.msg: Payment gating is enabled - must use bidding system

errors.name: BidTooLow
errors.msg: Bid amount is below minimum required

errors.name: BidNotHigherThanCurrent
errors.msg: Bid amount must be higher than current highest bid

errors.name: BidNotExpired
errors.msg: Bid has not expired yet - cannot claim username

errors.name: NotHighestBidder
errors.msg: You are not the highest bidder

errors.name: HighestBidder
errors.msg: You the current highest bidder, Cannot claim refund.

errors.name: CannotBidOnOwnBid
errors.msg: Cannot bid on your own bid

errors.name: UsernameAlreadyHasBid
errors.msg: Username already has an active bid

errors.name: CannotCancelBid
errors.msg: Cannot cancel bid - you are not the bidder

errors.name: UsernameHasActiveBid
errors.msg: Username has active bid - cannot create directly

errors.name: PaymentRequired
errors.msg: Payment required - marketplace has payment gating enabled

errors.name: UsernameReserved
errors.msg: Username is reserved and cannot be used

errors.name: MailboxAlreadyLinked
errors.msg: This mailbox is already linked to another username

errors.name: MailboxLinkMismatch
errors.msg: Mailbox link mismatch - username not linked to this mailbox

errors.name: RefundGracePeriodNotMet
errors.msg: Refund grace period not met - must wait 24 hours after bid expiration

Fixed-size fields first for efficient querying

docs: Marketplace Settings - Global configuration for bidding system

docs: Simple PDA account for treasury

types.name: SolmailCentralState
docs: Central State for managing collection and program authority

types.name: UsernameAccount
docs: OPTIMIZED Username Account structure PDA
Fixed-size fields first for efficient memcmp filtering with predictable offsets

types.name: UsernameWrapper
docs: OPTIMIZED Username Wrapper - PDA that holds username authority during tokenization
Fixed-size fields first for efficient querying

docs: Wrapper state tags for tracking tokenization status
